results.title: How do I report a missed rubbish collection in Westminster ...
results.snippet: You can let us know by calling on 020 7641 6180 and we will provide assistance. You can also report an issue by clicking on the button below.

results.title: Report a missed waste collection · Customer Self-Service
results.snippet: Login or Register to use MyWestminster, otherwise select next to continue. Westminster City Council Logo. All services · Events · News.

results.title: Report it | Westminster City Council
results.snippet: Waste and street cleaning. A line drawing of a broom with lines to show movement. Street washing and spills · Missed household recycling and rubbish collection ...

results.title: Contact us | Westminster City Council
results.snippet: Dec 21, 2020 ... You can report street problems online, including noise, dumped rubbish, missed bin collections and planning issues.

results.title: Westminster City Council Complaints Policy
results.snippet: This includes a report of a missed bin collection or an appointment for a ... When the complaint is over 12 months old, and the customer was aware of the issue ...

results.title: Westminster City Council Complaints Policy
results.snippet: ... issue isn't covered by the Policy and of any other action they can take: • A request for a service. This includes a report of a missed bin collection or an ...

results.title: Contact Us | Commercial Waste Westminster
results.snippet: Connect with us today to get in touch with our team. Request a quote, order waste bags, schedule a call back, and report missed waste.

results.title: Complaints | Westminster City Council
results.snippet: Jan 22, 2021 ... ... problem such as noise, dumped rubbish, missed recycling or rubbish collection, or planning issues. Report a problem. Complaints procedure.

results.title: Recycling and rubbish bins | Westminster City Council
results.snippet: Jul 10, 2024 ... If your food waste bin does go missing ... Check your collection days or report a missed mixed recycling and household rubbish collection.

results.title: Kerbside collections | Westminster City Council
results.snippet: If your black food waste bin was not emptied on your collection day by our crews, you can report the missed collection online. If your silver kitchen food ...

strengths: Direct service for reporting missed waste collection

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially meets the need as the website provides a form to report a missed waste collection, but it does not specify how soon they'll come to collect the bin or any other specific details related to this situation.
Reason.reasoning: While the content offers a service that addresses reporting missed collections, more context about what happens next or estimated time for collection would have been helpful for a council resident with a forgotten bin.
Reason.next_actions: Fill out the form provided to report the missed collection and contact the Council's customer service for a more detailed explanation regarding when they will come to collect the forgotten bin.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content serves the needs of council residents who want to report a missed waste collection, though additional details about what happens next or estimated times would improve user satisfaction and efficiency.
